unnormalised: Organic farming is cool, eh? My Nana in Kerala swears by it. Says his 2 acres yield more flavorful mangoes since 2010, despite the initial struggle. Less "chemical kick," more 'natural goodness', right? Heard IIT-Bombay is researching better desi cow manure options. Even my cousin, Priya, doing her MSc in Agri at Punjab Agri Uni says it's the future. Gotta ditch those pesticide Rs. 5000 bills, I say! Remember that Bharat Bandh in 2018 about this? We should all switch, maybe starting at 10:00 AM on 26/01/2024? Just a thought!
normalised: Organic farming is cool, eh? My Nana in Kerala swears by it. Says his two acres yield more flavorful mangoes since two thousand and ten, despite the initial struggle. Less "chemical kick," more 'natural goodness', right? Heard I I T-Bombay is researching better desi cow manure options. Even my cousin, Priya, doing her M S C in Agri at Punjab Agri Uni says it's the future. Gotta ditch those pesticide rupee five thousand bills, I say! Remember that Bharat Bandh in two thousand and eighteen about this? We should all switch, maybe starting at ten A M on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four? Just a thought!
